name: Authentic Greek Salad
ingredients: 1 large English cucumber, sliced into half-moons
6 oz feta cheese, cut into cubes or crumbled
steps:
Wash and dry romaine lettuce, then chop into bite-sized pieces.
Halve cherry tomatoes and place in a large salad bowl.
Slice cucumber into half-moon shapes (about 1/4 inch thick) and add to bowl.
Thinly slice red onion and add to the salad.
Add kalamata olives to the bowl.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper to create the dressing.
Add romaine lettuce to the salad bowl and gently toss with the vegetables.
Pour dressing over the salad and toss again until everything is well coated.
Add feta cheese cubes on top (or crumble over the salad).
Garnish with fresh oregano leaves if desired.
Serve immediately as a side dish or add grilled chicken for a complete meal.
